INSERT INTO T_INSPECTION_RECORDS( N_INSPECTION_REPORT_ID ,VC_CHECK_ITEM ,VC_CHECK_POINT ,VC_CHECK_NOTE ,VC_OPER_NOTE ,VC_IS_EXCEPTION ,VC_CHECK_RESULT ,VC_PROTO_DATA ,VC_DEAL_RESULT ,VC_INSPECTION_TYPE ,DT_ADD_TIME ,VC_CHECK_CODE ) VALUES( #{inspectionReportID}, #{checkItem}, #{checkPoint}, #{checkNote}, #{operNote}, #{isException}, #{checkResult}, #{protoData}, #{dealResult}, #{inspectionType}, getdate(), #{checkCode} )
select @@IDENTITY as inspectionRecordsID
